EmailTemplate.subject: BendixKing Dealer Newsletter June 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> Dealer Newsletter - June 2020
Honeywell will continue to do what we can to ensure you have the product, support and information you need during this difficult time.
For information on how we are responding to COVID-19, please visit the Aerospace FAQ page <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/aero-covid-19]]>.
NEWS BRIEFS BREAKING NEWS: AeroWave Offers Unlimited Connectivity with $399/month Flat Fee AeroWave now offers two affordable plans: $399/month or $39.99/hour for unlimited data. Each plan offers the convenience of staying in touch on all personal devices from takeoff to touchdown. The monthly plan is a great choice for leisure users, while hourly provides the same level of connectivity for power users. Existing AeroWave customers can send an email to sales@bendixking.com <[[mailto:sales@bendixking.com?subject=AeroWave New Plan]]> to move to the new monthly flat fee plan! For additional questions please reach out to sapan.shah@honeywell.com <[[mailto:sapan.shah@honeywell.com?subject=AeroWave New Plan]]> AeroWave 100 Product Page <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/ca/connected-aircraft/aerowave]]>
SALES BULLETINS AeroWave 100 New Data Plan BendixKing is pleased to offer new data plans with higher bandwidth to our current as well as new AeroWave 100 customers. This service bulletin will list out the details of the new plans along with some frequently asked questions, with Dealer Bulletin 2020BK-08 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020BK-08%20AeroWave%20100%20New%20Data%20Plan.pdf?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiTlRKa01UZGpZV00yTW1GaCIsInQiOiJPNnJ6UXFPUk5vK2lzbk5BOU5xMm50MHJsSmZcL1ZVc3IxbUpmSGdtQXdEZk12TytENVNxdGRUMmNqRnJLSUFSMjM3MVJBR25IZWtWelVnMHNHTVVKcWc9PSJ9]]>.
Dealer Match Incentive Program Understanding the difficult time we are all in, BendixKing is offering a dealer "match" incentive to help our Dealers reach their desired tier level status and provide you with a greater discount through the end of 2021. This program will run from June through September 2020 and will apply to purchases of eligible BendixKing products placed within this timeframe, with Dealer Bulletin 2020BK-09 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020BK-09%20Dealer%20Match%20Incentive%20Program.pdf?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiTlRKa01UZGpZV00yTW1GaCIsInQiOiJPNnJ6UXFPUk5vK2lzbk5BOU5xMm50MHJsSmZcL1ZVc3IxbUpmSGdtQXdEZk12TytENVNxdGRUMmNqRnJLSUFSMjM3MVJBR25IZWtWelVnMHNHTVVKcWc9PSJ9]]>.
The complete list of 2020 sales bulletins is available HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/sales-bulletins]]>. Dealers must log in to view these bulletins.
SHOWS & EVENTS Meet us in the "virtual" skies! EAA AirVenture 2020 in Oshkosh may be cancelled but we’ll be connecting with you virtually with training sessions, exciting new product announcements, product demos, show specials and more.
More information coming in July and check our EVENTS page here: https://www.bendixking.com/en/about-us/events <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/about-us/events]]>
Don’t forget to watch the "live look in" - short product information video snippets that are mentioned in this newsletter. Stay well, fly safe and we’ll see you soon!
CUSTOMER WEBINARS On-Demand Webinars: In case you missed it, check out these recent webinars:
AeroVue Touch primary flight display: Is it right for your next upgrade? In this webinar, BendixKing’s Simon Williams along with SocialFlight President Jeff Simon, discuss the blend of open integration combined with powerful features that provide a cost-effective installation strategy for avionics upgrades. Learn about this unit, including the panel planning process, installation tips and whether the AeroVue Touch might be the right choice for your next panel upgrade. View it HERE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AeroVue_Touch_and_Integrated_PanelBK_LP_Webinar_SocialFlight_AeroVue_Touch_and_Integrated_Panel_MC.html]]>. Access Code: 748302
AeroWave 100 in-flight connectivity: New data plans to fit your needs. In this webinar, BendixKing’s Sapan Shah provides fresh insight on the AeroWave 100 and how it provides you and your passengers the convenience of staying in touch on personal devices from takeoff to touchdown. Explore which new data plan is right for you. View it HERE <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/rhvg4jFa9YZFCEVRk9xUWc]]>.
